summary: Add a Gallery option "All files" to allow bulk-selecting all items for actions (send to folder/mission, download, share, delete) without changing other app functionality.
architectural_notes: Scope constraint: implement the Gallery "All files" bulk-select option without changing any other existing app functionality.

existing_features.title: In the Gallery bulk-selection UI, add an explicit option labeled "All files" that lets the user select all items currently shown in the Gallery (current view: main collection or the currently opened folder) in one action, so the existing bulk actions (move to folder, move to mission, download, share, delete) can be applied to the entire set without manually selecting each item.

Implement a clear way to undo the "All files" bulk selection without changing existing flows (e.g., a toggle behavior on the same "All files" control to deselect all, or an adjacent "Clear selection" control), keeping all other Gallery behaviors unchanged.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add "All files" option in Gallery to bulk-select all files for batch actions (send to folder/mission, download, share, delete).

projectName: Add “All files” bulk-select option in Gallery
